name: UpdateProjectProperties
description:
Update properties of an existing project.

This tool updates various properties of an existing project, such as name, color, sort order, view mode, and kind. It should be used when changes to these attributes are needed for a project on Ticktick.

parameters.name: project_identifier
parameters.description: Unique ID of the project to update.

value_schema.description: Project identifier - the unique ID of the project to update

parameters.name: project_name
parameters.description: The new name for the project to be updated. This should be a string representing the desired project name.

parameters.name: project_color
parameters.description: Hex color code representing the color of the project, such as '#FFFFFF'.

value_schema.description: Color of the project - hex color code

parameters.name: project_sort_order
parameters.description: Sort order value for the project, default is 0. Determines the project's position relative to others.

parameters.name: project_view_mode
parameters.description: Specifies the view mode of the project. Options are 'list', 'kanban', or 'timeline'.

value_schema.description: View mode - how the project is displayed

parameters.name: project_kind
parameters.description: Specify the type of project: TASK or NOTE.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the ticktick API.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Project identifier - the unique ID of the project to update

value_schema.description: Project identifier - the unique ID of the project to update

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: Color of the project - hex color code

value_schema.description: Color of the project - hex color code

parameters.name: viewMode
parameters.description: View mode - how the project is displayed

value_schema.description: View mode - how the project is displayed

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
